channel.title: CVE Feed for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. / Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- V-Server and V-Server Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. / Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- V-Server and V-Server Lite

item.title: CVE-2022-30549|2024-08-03T06:48:36.444Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20%2F%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-server%20and%20v-server%20lite
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in V-Server v4.0.11.0 and earlier and V-Server Lite v4.0.13.0 and earlier, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.

item.title: CVE-2022-29524|2024-08-03T06:26:06.068Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20%2F%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-server%20and%20v-server%20lite
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in V-Server v4.0.11.0 and earlier and V-Server Lite v4.0.13.0 and earlier, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.
